ComicInfo.Title: The Morning Feeding; Spy Vs. Spy; The Mad Guide to Cleaning Up Your #*!%&*@# Vocabulary; Flirty Dancing; The Lighter Side of...; Putz Adams; A Mad Look at Plastic Surgery; The Jesse Venturification of U.S. Politics; Monroe and... the Funeral; The Mad Book of Suicide Etiquette; Satirize This
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Black Spy tries to ruin a ribbon-cutting ceremony where White Spy is the man of distinction. However, when Black Spy attempts to ram him with a car, White Spy activates a traffic barrier.
A cynical look at justice, reasoning, corporate thinking, force, dieting, communication, relationships, fashion, therapy, integrity, the office, school, and doctors.
